html:
Dec 2 (Reuters) - British asset manager abrdn ABDN.L said on Thursday it would buy privately held online investment platform Interactive Investor for 1.49 billion pounds ($1.98 billion).

Interactive Investor Chief Executive Officer Richard Wilson will join abrdn and continue to lead the platform, the asset manager said in a statement.


($1 = 0.7509 pounds)


(Reporting by Sachin Ravikumar in Bengaluru;
Editing by Vinay Dwivedi)

(( saisachin.r@tr.com ; +91 80 6182 2754; Twitter: https://twitter.com/sachinr27; ))
